name: Spiny Adventures
description:
Spiny Adventures is a lovely hard puzzle-platformer with runner elements. You'll need to overcome different obstacles to get a tasty mushroom and bring it into your house. Be aware of lasers, be quick and smart.

▪ Hedgehog
▪ Various locations
▪ Two game mode : Standart and OLD TV
▪ Steam trading cards
▪ Steam achievements
▪ Pleasant music

Controls:
▪ Move - keyboard arrows
▪ Restart - R on a keyboard
▪ Menu - Esc
